title: Built environment disparities are amplified during extreme weather recovery
summary:
Nature, Published online: 03 December 2025; doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09804-3

Higher-income neighbourhoods rebuild and improve after disasters while lower-income areas do not return to pre-disaster conditions.
body: Nature, Published online: 03 December 2025; doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09804-3 Higher-income neighbourhoods rebuild and improve after disasters while lower-income areas do not return to pre-disaster conditions.
